Class UserService

    public class UserService
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    This class is responsible for interacting with table containing all ever signed up users in database.

      • createNewUser

        public void createNewUser(java.lang.String username,
                          java.lang.String password)
                   throws GameIntegrityViolationException
        Creates new account for given user. Saves username in a database. Generates salt for given user and stores it in db. Hashes the password and stores it in db.
        Parameters:
        username - username
        password - password
        Throws:
        GameIntegrityViolationException - if pbkdf2 was implemented incorrectly
